author: Henry Charles Gernhardt III
message:
Hm! Strangely enough, I kinda liked the look of the blinky s/bug/feature/i. Kinda the same way I like haptic feedback on my tablet. Any thought on putting it in as a feature? :)

Seriously, though, I feel your pain. Tracking down bugs like that has turned out to be a bane of my existence.
